channel.title: Japanese on In Search of Lost Time
channel.description: Recent content in Japanese on In Search of Lost Time

item.title: 「時の流れに身を任せ」 テレサテン (1986)
item.description: Title of the song translates to Give yourself to the flow of time by Teresa Teng from her 1986 album of the same name

item.title: 「結婚しようよ」 吉田拓郎 (1972)
item.description: Title of the song translates to Let’s Marry by Takuro Yoshida from his 1972 single of the same name 僕の髪が肩までのびて 君と同じになったら 約束どおり町の教会で 結婚しようよ MMMM

item.title: 「都会」 小貫妙子 (1977)
item.description: Title of the song translates to City by Taeko Ohnuki from his 1977 album Sunshower 眠らない夜の街 nemura nai yoru no machi ざわめく光の洪水 zawa meki hikari no kozui 通り色どる女 toori iro doru onna 着飾る心と遊ぶ kikazaru kokoro no asobu

item.title: 「あなたのいない夜」 荒木一郎 (1974)
item.description: Title of the song translates to Evening silence of your absence by Ichiro Araki from his 1974 Album 蹉跌 (Setback)
